content:
# I have successfully returned to the stone furnace's location.
# 
# I will now retrieve the stone furnace entity and insert the iron ore into it to keep the smelting process ongoing.

stone_furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}, position=Position(x=-7.0, y=7.0))[0]  # Retrieve the stone furnace entity.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 iron ore into the stone furnace to continue smelting.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the updated inventory.
